Package com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle

Class MetadataGeneratorLogger

java.lang.Object
com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.AbstractAutomaticBean
com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.MetadataGeneratorLogger
All Implemented Interfaces:
AuditListener, Configurable, Contextualizable, EventListener
public class MetadataGeneratorLogger extends AbstractAutomaticBean implements AuditListener
Simple logger for metadata generator util.

    • finishLocalSetup

      protected void finishLocalSetup()
      Description copied from class: AbstractAutomaticBean
      Provides a hook to finish the part of this component's setup that was not handled by the bean introspection.

      The default implementation does nothing.
